body.name: DaVinci Kalani 6-Drawer Double Wide Dresser in Grey
features: DURABILITY: 6 spacious drawers that can hold all the adorable baby clothes, blanket, and more We've built this dresser with features like additional corner blocks to make it sturdier and long-lasting

VERSATILE DESIGN: Changing station now Big kid dresser later! This dresser is designed so that you can add a DaVinci changing tray (#M0619) to use as a convenient changing station during the baby years
SMOOTH GLIDE: Pre-installed euro glides that make opening the drawers easy even when your hands are full with baby
QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of solid sustainable New Zealand pinewood and TSCA compliant engineered wood -only the best for your baby
FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY: Say goodbye to toxic chemicals! Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe Stop mechanism and anti-tip kit included for additional safety
body.description: The Kalani 6-Drawer Dresser is the smart changing and storage solution for the classic Kalani, Emily and Porter nursery collections. Six spacious drawers provide ample storage to organize all of baby’s necessities, while its thoughtful design ensures a style fit for any nursery or bedroom. The Kalani Double Dresser is detailed with recessed front drawer panels, a gently curved apron front and curved top sides.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kalani 4-in-1 Convertible Crib Kalani 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib Universal Wide Removable Changing Tray Kalani 3-Drawer Dresser Contour Changing Pad for Changing Tray Shown In: White Grey White White -

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color, my daughter loved it and so did I.
reviews.reviewText: I love the color, sturdiness and ease of assembling. It’s so pretty! Got the matching smaller dresser as well as a different brand pair of night stands for my teenage daughter’s room. Not bulky, not have a full capacity as an adult master dresser does but it’s roomy enough for leggings, undergarments, makeup, socks, Accessories, etc.. very pleased!It arrived with a shattered corner on the top and cracks on the sides (rough handling maybe) but Amazon was very helpful and exchanged quickly and easily!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I told my husband to check each piece and make sure he had all of them before he started. He can fix things so he has to adjust one drawer so that it lined up correctly. He put it together rather quickly and we hope it will hold up. Looks nice, matches the photos online and the davinci Charlie crib we got. Drawers don’t pull out fully - figure it’s a safety precaution for children but will use it anyway. We got lucky - it arrived quickly and undamaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid; nice piece.
reviews.reviewText: My son and wife love it. Looks great in baby’s room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took about 3 hours to assemble but it’s great quality. The only complaint i have is the dresser drawers do not pull out far as I would like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: Assembling this was confusing at first but then it was easy. I understood why the directions were written the way it was and that made it smooth to assemble. It’s very sturdy. It’s big but was easy to move from one place to the next after assembling. This is very sturdy and firm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Time consuming but worth the bargain in the end (for now).
reviews.reviewText: This is one step below solid wood (so plywood). For the price it's a great deal but be prepared for some frustration and 4 hours of assembly (this is my second one to assemble in a week and I am handy). Also give yourself a two week runway. Opened the day I got it and packaging looked solid. All the way in the middle were 6 cracked drawer sides. 3 to 5 business days to process and ship replacements (and that's calling during 8 to 5 business hours) and no expedited shipping so another 5 days to ship coast to coast. At least they were free....dent in the bottom wood....no one will notice, but I will....also have a baby room to ready so couldn't wait a week for that piece, only for half the drawers! Parenting priorities. Once done it was nice and seems rather sturdy. Process was far from desirable. Let's hope it survives the kids growing up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Más de lo esperado aunque un poco difícil de montar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good option: Shallow drawers make it worthless. Do not buy.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this and a matching crib. The quality is about commensurate to the price.It took two hours to assemble and I am pretty handy.The real issue is that the drawers are absurdly shallow and they don't even open out all of the way. Based upon the depth of the dresser, the drawers could have been easily three inches deeper. I would have never bought this had I known. Considering the relatively large size of the dresser and the enormous effort it takes to put it together, and the tiny, shallow drawers that barely open, it is just not worth having.As I write this I am contemplating whether to keep it, try to disassemble it and return it, or just give it away and write off the $300.Stacking six plastic boxes would be a better solution than this dresser.

You definitely need two people to assemble this dresser as there are some tricky steps that require some stabilization. Overall it looks great, but the drawers don't come out all the way and are quite small which makes it difficult to get things into the back of the drawer and organize it the way you want. I would suggest investing in a "normal" sized dresser right off the bat so that it can grow with the child and their clothes!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not worth the price, cheap quality
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is NOT worth the price. I have been setting up a lot of furniture over the past couple of years and have never gone through a setup that is this bad. As per the photos attached, the screw went in and cracked the piece of wood. The other issue was a hole that wasn't pre-drilled correctly. Had to modify the hole so the screw would go through to connect with the metal piece at the opposite end.
